title: A Wrinkle in Time
author: Madeleine L'Engle
description: A science fantasy novel that follows the adventures of a young girl, her brother, and their friend as they travel through time and space to rescue their father.

title: Artemis Fowl
author: Eoin Colfer
description: A science fantasy novel about a young Irish criminal mastermind who kidnaps a fairy in order to restore his family's wealth.

title: The Giver
author: Lois Lowry
description: A dystopian novel that follows a young boy named Jonas as he uncovers the dark secrets of his society.

title: Ender's Game
author: Orson Scott Card
description: A thrilling science fiction novel following a young prodigy as he prepares for an alien invasion.

title: Anne of Green Gables
author: L.M. Montgomery
description: A heartwarming story about a spirited orphan girl named Anne who finds a new home and family in Green Gables.

title: Little Women
author: Louisa May Alcott
description: A classic novel that follows the lives of the four March sisters as they grow from childhood to womanhood.

title: The Secret Garden
author: Frances Hodgson Burnett
description: A beautiful story about a young girl named Mary who discovers a hidden, neglected garden and the healing power it holds.

title: Charlotte's Web
author: E.B. White
description: A touching tale of friendship between a young pig named Wilbur and a clever spider named Charlotte.

title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
author: Lewis Carroll
description: A whimsical and imaginative tale of a young girl named Alice and her extraordinary adventures in Wonderland.

title: Peter Pan
author: J.M. Barrie
description: An enchanting story about the boy who never grows up and his adventures in the magical world of Neverland.

title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
author: Mark Twain
description: A classic novel that follows the mischievous and adventurous young boy, Tom Sawyer, in a small town on the Mississippi River.

title: The Wind in the Willows
author: Kenneth Grahame
description: A delightful tale of the adventures of Mole, Ratty, Badger, and Toad in the English countryside.

title: Percy Jackson and the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
author: Rick Riordan
description: An exciting fantasy adventure following the journey of Percy Jackson, a demigod and the son of Poseidon.

title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
author: Jeff Kinney
description: A hilarious and relatable diary-style book following the life of Greg Heffley, a middle school student.

title: The Hunger Games
author: Suzanne Collins
description: A gripping dystopian novel following Katniss Everdeen as she fights for survival in a brutal televised competition.

title: A Series of Unfortunate Events: The Bad Beginning
author: Lemony Snicket
description: The first book in a captivating series following the Baudelaire orphans as they uncover family secrets and evade the clutches of the evil Count Olaf.

title: Where the Wild Things Are
author: Maurice Sendak
description: A classic children's book that tells the story of Max and his imaginative journey to the land of the Wild Things.

title: The Very Hungry Caterpillar
author: Eric Carle
description: A beloved children's book that follows the journey of a hungry caterpillar as it transforms into a butterfly.

title: The Tale of Peter Rabbit
author: Beatrix Potter
description: A timeless tale about a mischievous young rabbit named Peter and his adventures in Mr. McGregor's garden.

title: Goosebumps: Welcome to Dead House
author: R.L. Stine
description: The first book in the Goosebumps series, filled with spooky and thrilling tales for young readers.

title: Coraline
author: Neil Gaiman
description: A dark fantasy children's novella about a young girl named Coraline who discovers a parallel world with sinister secrets.

title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
author: Alvin Schwartz
description: A collection of scary and eerie tales that will send shivers down young readers' spines.

title: The Witches
author: Roald Dahl
description: A thrilling and slightly creepy story about a young boy who discovers a society of witches plotting to turn children into mice.

title: Dog Man
author: Dav Pilkey
description: An adventurous and hilarious comic series about a part-dog, part-man superhero.

title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
author: Jeff Kinney
description: A hilarious and relatable diary-style book following the life of Greg Heffley, a middle school student.

title: Raina Telgemeier Box Set: Smile, Sisters, Drama, Ghosts
author: Raina Telgemeier
description: A set of captivating graphic novels that explore various themes such as family, friendship, and self-discovery.

title: Big Nate: In a Class by Himself
author: Lincoln Peirce
description: A humorous comic series following the life of Nate Wright, a sixth-grader, and his adventures in school and life.
